column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Going to the Art Institute reminds me of all the beauty in the world
column2: and the never-ending drive of artists to achieve that beauty
column4: or even just to represent the world through their eyes.  Being able to see such amazing
column5: priceless works of art in my own city is one of the reasons I love living in Chicago: it's here for my ogling pleasure.  Seeing the brush strokes of these famous works of art is breath-taking.  Even the giant
column6: airy rooms with their imposing security guards
column7: warning you not to get too close seem to whisk you away from your current reality.
